summary: This mod aims to add a variety of spells to the game, both new and old alike.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=lightblue][size=6]--Thymeless Spells--[/size][/color][/center]
[center][color=lightblue][size=5][Requires Dawnguard Expansion][/size][/color][/center]

This mod aims to add a variety of spells to the game, both new and old alike.


[color=lightblue][size=3]--Transfiguration--[/size][/color]
[b]Spell School:[/b] Alteration (Master)
[b]Base Magicka Cost:[/b] 100
[b]Tome Cost:[/b] 1000~2200 Gold
[b]Merchants:[/b] Tolfdir (College of Winterhold)

[b]Description:[/b]
Allows the player to change their appearance or even their race upon being cast. Unlike a certain console command, this will not reset your stats upon use, allowing you to entirely swap your race from one to another without fear. This spell can only be cast while in a state of meditation - following that of a level up - and cannot be cast at any other time.


[color=lightblue][size=3]--Feather--[/size][/color]
[b]Spell School:[/b] Alteration (Apprentice)
[b]Base Magicka Cost:[/b] 45
[b]Tome Cost:[/b] 200~500 Gold
[b]Merchants:[/b] Tolfdir (College of Winterhold), Calcelmo (Markarth)

[b]Description:[/b]
Fans of the Elder Scrolls series should require no introduction to this spell. Feather temporarily increases your carrying capacity, lightening your ever so heavy burden so that you may continue on your journey without fear of exhaustion!


[color=lightblue][size=3]--Fire Beam--[/size][/color]
[b]Spell School:[/b] Destruction (Master)
[b]Base Magicka Cost:[/b] 100/s
[b]Tome Cost:[/b] 1000~2200 Gold
[b]Merchants:[/b] Faralda (College of Winterhold), Enthir (College of Winterhold)

[b]Description:[/b]
Harness the energies of Fire, focusing it into a deadly beam of energy that sears your opponents.

[i](Note: Faralda will only sell this tome upon completing her Mastery quest: Destruction Ritual Spell)[/i]
[i](Note: Enthir will sell this tome at a premium, so although easier to obtain it will cost much more.)[/i]


[color=lightblue][size=3]--Frost Beam--[/size][/color]
[b]Spell School:[/b] Destruction (Master)
[b]Base Magicka Cost:[/b] 100/s
[b]Tome Cost:[/b] 1000~2200 Gold
[b]Merchants:[/b] Faralda (College of Winterhold), Enthir (College of Winterhold)

[b]Description:[/b]
Harness the energies of Ice, focusing it into a deadly beam of energy that freezes your opponents.

[i](Note: Faralda will only sell this tome upon completing her Mastery quest: Destruction Ritual Spell)[/i]
[i](Note: Enthir will sell this tome at a premium, so although easier to obtain it will cost much more.)[/i]


[color=lightblue][size=3]--Shock Beam--[/size][/color]
[b]Spell School:[/b] Destruction (Master)
[b]Base Magicka Cost:[/b] 100/s
[b]Tome Cost:[/b] 1000~2200 Gold
[b]Merchants:[/b] Faralda (College of Winterhold), Enthir (College of Winterhold)

[b]Description:[/b]
Harness the energies of Lightning, focusing it into a deadly beam of energy that electrocutes your opponents.

[i](Note: Faralda will only sell this tome upon completing her Mastery quest: Destruction Ritual Spell)[/i]
[i](Note: Enthir will sell this tome at a premium, so although easier to obtain it will cost much more.)[/i]


[color=lightblue][size=3]--Silence--[/size][/color]
[b]Spell School:[/b] Illusion (Expert)
[b]Base Magicka Cost:[/b] 100
[b]Tome Cost:[/b] 600~1300 Gold
[b]Merchants:[/b] Drevis (College of Winterhold), Sybille (Solitude)

[b]Description:[/b]
Stifle\'s the magicka of your opponent temporarily, preventing them from casting most spells.


[color=lightblue][size=3]--Summon Ethereal Death Hound--[/size][/color]
[b]Spell School:[/b] Conjuration (Adept)
[b]Base Magicka Cost:[/b] 55
[b]Tome Cost:[/b] 500~1200 Gold
[b]Merchants:[/b] Ronthil (Castle Volkihar)

[b]Description:[/b]
Summon the ghastly apparition of a Death Hound to stand by your side.. Scales to the player\'s Level (up to 30) and is enchanted with a constant drain effect which it inflicts upon all living targets.


[color=lightblue][size=3]--Summon Ancestral War Hound--[/size][/color]
[b]Spell School:[/b] Conjuration (Adept)
[b]Base Magicka Cost:[/b] 55
[b]Tome Cost:[/b] 500~1200 Gold
[b]Merchants:[/b] Florentius (Fort Dawnguard)

[b]Description:[/b]
Summon the apparition of a War Hound from ages past to stand by your side.. Scales to the player\'s Level (up to 30) and is enchanted with a constant sun damage effect which it inflicts upon all undead targets.



================================
[b]Change Log[/b]
================================

[b]Version 1.5.3[/b]
Added a new Spell: Fire Beam
Added a new Spell: Frost Beam
Added a new Spell: Shock Beam

[b]Version 1.5.2[/b]
Fixed a naming inconsistency with the Ethereal Death Hound.
Modified the Ethereal Death Hound so that it scales to the player\'s level. (Up to 30 max)
Added a passive buff to the Ethereal Death Hound that allows it to drain health from enemies.
Enabled Feather for Dual Casting.
Cleaned up a few ESP records internally.
Added a new Spell: Summon Ancestral War Hound

[b]Version 1.5.1[/b]
Added a new spell shader effect for Transfiguration.
Added a new Spell: Silence
Adjusted the magicka cost of all currently implemented spells.

[b]Version 1.5a[/b]
Removed a bad reference in the mod to something not implemented yet. (Was probably harmless.)
Added a new spell shader effect for Feather.
Fixed a minor error with the description of the Specreal Death Hound spell.

[b]Version 1.5[/b]
Transfiguration can now only be cast once per level-up.
Increased the Magicka cost of Transfiguration. (Up from 50 to 70)
Fixed a bug where casting Transfiguration would sometimes give the player a free level-up.
Added a new Spell: Feather
Added a new Spell: Conjure Spectral Death Hound

[b]Version 1.4[/b]
Forced the player into an idle animation after casting Transfiguration.
Extended a pause in the Transfiguration script, which will hopefully prevent bugs on faster computers.

[b]Version 1.3[/b]
Implemented Transfiguration support for Werewolves.
Fixed an issue where Dunmer were not working with the Transfiguration spell.

[b]Version 1.2[/b]
Implemented Transfiguration support for Dawnguard\'s Vampire Lords.

[b]Version 1.1[/b]
Changed the merchant for Transfiguration from Drevis Neloren to Toldfir in the College of Winterhold.
Lowered the Magicka cost of Transfiguration by half.

[b]Version 1.0[/b]
Initial Release
author: Krisan Thyme
